# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceed. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width = 10)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(str)
        if length(current_line + word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word * " "
        else
            current_line += word * " "
        end
    end
    push!(lines, current_line)
    join(lines, "\n")
end
```
Example:
```julia
str = "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog."
wrap_string(str)

# Output:
"The quick\nbrown fox\njumps over\nthe lazy dog."
```
